title: How to Find North on Google Maps on Android

steps.title: Open Google Maps on your Android.
steps.content: Open Google Maps on your Android. Look for the tiny map icon labeled “Maps” on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.title: Tap the location button.
steps.content: Tap the location button. It's near the bottom-right corner of the map and looks like a solid black circle inside a larger circle with crosshairs. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the compass button.
steps.content: Tap the compass button. It's the red and white double-arrow icon near the top-right corner of the screen. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Find the “N” on the compass.
steps.content: Find the “N” on the compass. When the red “N” appears on the compass, the red needle will be pointing to the north. [3] X Research source The “N” will disappear quickly. You can tap the compass button again to bring it back up.
